Journal Story: today is our first time hiking in the rain and our highest elevation to date. It looks pretty daunting, but we will do our best. Missing everyone at home like crazy! Wish us luck!????

We pushed past Blue Mountain and grabbed a shuttle to town for a zero day today. That means we will not hike but stay in a motel to clean up and rest. We have chores to do and some gear to send home. We are getting in the groove , but every single mile is hard earned!
